name: hv_vcpu_exit_exception_t
desc: The structure that describes information about an exit from the virtual CPU (vCPU) to the host.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new VCPU exit exception instance.

items.name: init(syndrome: hv_exception_syndrome_t, virtual_address: hv_exception_address_t, physical_address: hv_ipa_t)
items.desc: Creates a new VCPU exit exception instance.with the parameters you provide.

items.name: var physical_address: hv_ipa_t
items.desc: The intermediate physical address of the exception in the client.

items.name: var syndrome: hv_exception_syndrome_t
items.desc: The vCPU exception syndrome causing the exception.

items.name: var virtual_address: hv_exception_address_t
items.desc: The vCPU virtual address of the exception.
